data.description:
Stream Major League Baseball games live and on-demand on your Meta Quest with MLB VR.

MLB VR brings live game streaming and real-time data visualization to fans! Dive deeper into data and experience baseball in ways only possible in VR. Analyze pitch locations in the 3D Strike Zone, track the players on the field, and more.

FEATURES
• Stream out-of-market games from your favorite team with the official Major League Baseball VR streaming app*
• Watch select games for Free with MLB. TV’s Game of the Day**
• Link your MLB.TV Subscription and watch full games on demand going back to the start of the 2018 Regular Season* 
• Dig deeper with Pitch-By-Pitch data visualization and 3D Strike Zone powered by Statcast, allowing you to analyze every pitch in VR
• Follow your team home or away with national and regional audio broadcasts.

*Requires MLB.TV Subscription
** Requires an MLB.com Account

changelog.change_log:
MLBVR 1.6 contains significant enhancements across the experience.

Highlights include:

 - Revamped360 Gameday UI, Main Menu UI, and added a 360 content filter to the schedule
 - Fixed “jittery” 360 video issue
 - Many fixes to Gameday experience
 - Several stability and usability improvements

commit d10f79cd35acfc215f279e825aff1f24c2c124d4
Author: Scyzm <gerickson@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Jun 23 15:20:16 2023 -0400
    Add in the .so files for the oculus surface plugins from dev_quest. This should fix the IL2CPP black screen issue, and have full 32 & 64 bit support.
